# NullableExtensions class

Static class than contains extension methods for nullable structures.

```csharp
public static class NullableExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [AsNotNullValue&lt;T&gt;](NullableExtensions/AsNotNullValue.md)(…) | Gets the value of the current Nullable&lt;T&gt; object if it has been assigned a valid underlying value. If is null (or Nothing in Visual Basic) returns yours default value defined for your type. (2 methods) |
